channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Russia issues warning as European leaders, Zelenskyy meet in Paris before Trump call
item.description: Russia's Foreign Ministry again warned that Moscow will not accept the presence of any Western troops in Ukraine as part of a future peace deal.

item.title: WATCH: Maryland corn maze pays tribute to ‘Wicked’
item.description: This "Wicked"-inspired corn maze opens to the public next week, just in time for the release of "Wicked: For Good" in November.

item.title: Judge blocks Trump's $2.2 billion Harvard funding freeze
item.description: A federal judge has stopped the Trump administration's attempt to axe $2.2 billion in research funding for Harvard University.

item.title: Soldiers doused with gas, set on fire during mission to destroy cocaine lab
item.description: Colombia's defense minister posted video of one of the victims, calling the perpetrators "criminals and narcos who attempted to murder our soldiers."

item.title: The government's next jobs report lands Friday. Here's what to look for.
item.description: After President Trump expressed "shock" over the pace of hiring in July, much is riding on the employment data for August.

item.title: Texas lawmakers approve letting private citizens sue abortion pill providers

item.description: A federal judge in Boston has ordered the reversal of over $2.6 billion in federal funding cuts to Harvard University.
